title: Keeping Children Safe In Education Statutory 2023 / REF LA F 1

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,/ REF LA F 1
This request relates to Keeping Children Safe In Education Statutory Guidance 2023 -  sections 176-179 , published on 6th June 2023 and effective from 1st September 2023.
Please provide me with copies of all correspondence between 1st January and 31st May 2023 ( including emails) from or to the DFE ( Department of Education) about the possibility of including children with a EHCP or “ any child deemed vulnerable “ within the scope of section 178 of the above guidance .
Yours faithfully,
John Ormerod

Dear Sheffield City Council,/ REF LA F 1
This request relates to Keeping Children Safe In Education Statutory
Guidance 2023 -  sections 176-179 , published on 6th June 2023 and
effective from 1st September 2023.
(1) Please provide me with copies of all correspondence between 1st
January and 31st May 2023 ( including emails) from or to the DFE (
Department of Education) about the possibility of including children with
a EHCP or “ any child deemed vulnerable “ within the scope of section 178
of the above guidance.
(2) Please provide me with all copies of correspondence between 1st
January and 31st May 2023 ( including emails) from or to the LGA ( Local
Government Association) the ADCS ( Association of Directors of Children’s
Services) or AEHEP( Association Elective Home Education Professionals)
about the possibility of including children with a EHCP or “ any child
deemed vulnerable” within the scope of section 178 of the above guidance.
(3) Please provide me with copies of all correspondence from 1st April
2023 to the present ( including emails) from or to the DFE ( Department
for Education) relevant to the implementation of the sections listed above
.
(4) Please provide me with copies of all correspondence from 1st April
2023 to the present ( including emails) from or to the LGA ( Local
Government Association) the ADCS ( Association of Directors Of Children’s
Services) or AEHEP( Association of Elective Home Education Professionals)
relevant to the implementation of the sections listed above .
(5) Please supply me with copies of any correspondence since 1st April
2023 to the present ( including emails) sent to the schools in your area
from the Local Authority, relevant to their implementation of the sections
listed above .
Yours faithfully,
John Ormerod
